properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'
) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_ID,ROOM_PRICE) IN (SELECT HOTEL_ID, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING (HOTEL_ID) WHERE ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? GROUP BY HOTEL_ID)

SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN HOTEL_FILE H USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM JOIN RESERVATION USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE (CHECK_IN BETWEEN TO_DATE(?,'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YY-MM-DD') OR CHECK_OUT BETWEEN TO_DATE(?,'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YY-MM-DD')) AND CHECK_OUT ^= TO_DATE(?,'YY-MM-DD') AND ROOM_NO = ?

INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , ROOM_NO , CHECK_IN , CHECK_OUT , REQUEST , PAY_TYPE , PAY_PRICE , PAY_CODE , PAY_STATUS , STATUS , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , GUEST_NAME , GUEST_PHONE , ROOM_COUNT ) VALUES ( RSV_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' , 'Y' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY ? ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_ID,ROOM_PRICE) IN (SELECT HOTEL_ID, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING (HOTEL_ID) WHERE ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? GROUP BY HOTEL_ID)

SELECT REVIEW_NO , R.ACCOUNT_ID , R.RESERVATION_NO , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_GRADE , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , R.STATUS , RCOUNT , NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN RESERVATION S ON(R.RESERVATION_NO = S.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN ROOM O ON(S.ROOM_NO = O.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT A ON(R.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID) WHERE HOTEL_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT AVG(NVL(R.REVIEW_GRADE,0)) FROM REVIEW R JOIN RESERVATION S ON(R.RESERVATION_NO = S.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN ROOM O ON(S.ROOM_NO = O.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT A ON(R.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID) WHERE HOTEL_ID = ?
SELECT FILE_ID, ROOM_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, FILE_URL FROM ROOM_FILE JOIN ROOM USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN HOTEL USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY ROOM_PRICE DESC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_ID,ROOM_PRICE) IN (SELECT HOTEL_ID, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING (HOTEL_ID) WHERE ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? GROUP BY HOTEL_ID) ORDER BY ROOM_PRICE ASC

SELECT RNUM , REVIEW_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , RESERVATION_NO , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_GRADE , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , RCOUNT , NAME , HOTEL_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,A.* FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO , R.ACCOUNT_ID , R.RESERVATION_NO , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_GRADE , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , R.STATUS , RCOUNT , NAME , HOTEL_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN RESERVATION S ON(R.RESERVATION_NO = S.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN ROOM O ON(S.ROOM_NO = O.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT A ON(R.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID) JOIN HOTEL H USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_ID = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC )A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R JOIN RESERVATION S ON(R.RESERVATION_NO = S.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN ROOM O ON(S.ROOM_NO = O.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOUNT A ON(R.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID) JOIN HOTEL H USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_ID = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND ROOM_PRICE BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND ROOM_PRICE >= ?

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ROOM_PRICE BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY ROOM_PRICE ASC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND ROOM_PRICE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND (HOTEL_ID,ROOM_PRICE) IN (SELECT HOTEL_ID, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING (HOTEL_ID) WHERE ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? GROUP BY HOTEL_ID)
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HOTEL JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE (HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%') AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'))

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HOTEL_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL , STATUS , ROOM_NO , ROOM_COUNT , ROOM_PRICE , ADULT_COUNT , CHILD_COUNT , HOTEL_SERVICE , BED_TYPE , ROOM_TYPE FROM HOTEL H JOIN HOTEL_FILE USING(HOTEL_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' OR HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADULT_COUNT >= ? AND CHILD_COUNT >= ? AND (HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%' AND HOTEL_SERVICE LIKE '%'|| ? || '%')

SELECT B.* , A.NAME FROM ACCOUNT A , (SELECT Q.QNA_NO ,Q.ACCOUNT_ID ,Q.HOTEL_ID ,Q.QNA_TITLE ,Q.QNA_CONTENT ,Q.QNA_ANSWER ,Q.CREATE_DATE ,Q.STATUS ,Q.QNACOUNT ,Q.QNA_STATUS ,Q.MODIFY_DATE , H.HOTEL_NAME FROM HOTEL H, QNA Q WHERE Q.HOTEL_ID = H.HOTEL_ID ) B WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = B.ACCOUNT_ID AND HOTEL_ID = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT B.* , A.NAME FROM ACCOUNT A , (SELECT Q.QNA_NO ,Q.ACCOUNT_ID ,Q.HOTEL_ID ,Q.QNA_TITLE ,Q.QNA_CONTENT ,Q.QNA_ANSWER ,Q.CREATE_DATE ,Q.STATUS ,Q.QNACOUNT ,Q.QNA_STATUS ,Q.MODIFY_DATE , H.HOTEL_NAME FROM HOTEL H, QNA Q WHERE Q.HOTEL_ID = H.HOTEL_ID ) B WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = B.ACCOUNT_ID AND QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET QNACOUNT = QNACOUNT + 1 WHERE QNA_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , STATUS , BUSINESS_LICENSE , HOTEL_STATUS , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.HOTEL_ID , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_NAME , A.HOTEL_ADDRESS , A.HOTEL_PHONE , A.STATUS , A.BUSINESS_LICENSE , A.HOTEL_STATUS , B.FILE_RENAME , B.FILE_URL FROM HOTEL A LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_PHOTO B ON(A.HOTEL_ID = B.HOTEL_ID) WHERE HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.HOTEL_ID DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE HOTEL SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE HOTEL_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'N'

INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , STATUS , QNACOUNT , QNA_STATUS , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , SYSDATE )

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , STATUS , BUSINESS_LICENSE , HOTEL_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.HOTEL_ID , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_NAME , A.HOTEL_ADDRESS , A.HOTEL_PHONE , A.STATUS , A.BUSINESS_LICENSE , A.HOTEL_STATUS FROM HOTEL A WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = ? ORDER BY A.HOTEL_ID DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.HOTEL_ID , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_NAME , A.HOTEL_ADDRESS , A.HOTEL_PHONE , A.STATUS , A.BUSINESS_LICENSE , A.HOTEL_STATUS FROM HOTEL A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND ACCOUNT_ID = ? ORDER BY A.HOTEL_ID DESC) C)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND ACCOUNT_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND ACCOUNT_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , STATUS , BUSINESS_LICENSE , HOTEL_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.HOTEL_ID , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_NAME , A.HOTEL_ADDRESS , A.HOTEL_PHONE , A.STATUS , A.BUSINESS_LICENSE , A.HOTEL_STATUS FROM HOTEL A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HOTEL_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND ACCOUNT_ID = ? ORDER BY A.HOTEL_ID DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RNUM , HOTEL_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , STATUS , BUSINESS_LICENSE , HOTEL_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.HOTEL_ID , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_NAME , A.HOTEL_ADDRESS , A.HOTEL_PHONE , A.STATUS , A.BUSINESS_LICENSE , A.HOTEL_STATUS FROM HOTEL A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HOTEL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND ACCOUNT_ID = ? ORDER BY A.HOTEL_ID DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT Q.QNA_NO , Q.ACCOUNT_ID , Q.HOTEL_ID , Q.QNA_TITLE , Q.QNA_CONTENT , Q.QNA_ANSWER , Q.CREATE_DATE , Q.STATUS , Q.QNACOUNT , Q.QNA_STATUS , Q.MODIFY_DATE FROM QNA Q WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' AND HOTEL_ID = ? ORDER BY Q.HOTEL_ID DESC) C)

SELECT RNUM , QNA_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , CREATE_DATE , STATUS , QNACOUNT , QNA_STATUS , MODIFY_DATE , HOTEL_NAME , NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_ID , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_CONTENT , A.QNA_ANSWER , A.CREATE_DATE , A.STATUS , A.QNACOUNT , A.QNA_STATUS , A.MODIFY_DATE , H.HOTEL_NAME , S.NAME FROM QNA A , HOTEL H , ACCOUNT S WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HOTEL_ID = H.HOTEL_ID AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = S.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.HOTEL_ID = ? ORDER BY A.QNA_NO DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE QNA SET QNA_ANSWER = ? , QNA_STATUS = 2 WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND HOTEL_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND HOTEL_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , QNA_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , CREATE_DATE , STATUS , QNACOUNT , QNA_STATUS , MODIFY_DATE , HOTEL_NAME , NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_ID , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_CONTENT , A.QNA_ANSWER , A.CREATE_DATE , A.STATUS , A.QNACOUNT , A.QNA_STATUS , A.MODIFY_DATE , H.HOTEL_NAME , S.NAME FROM QNA A , HOTEL H , ACCOUNT S WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HOTEL_ID = H.HOTEL_ID AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = S.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.HOTEL_ID = ? AND QNA_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY A.QNA_NO DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RNUM , QNA_NO , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , CREATE_DATE , STATUS , QNACOUNT , QNA_STATUS , MODIFY_DATE , HOTEL_NAME , NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.* FROM (SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.ACCOUNT_ID , A.HOTEL_ID , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_CONTENT , A.QNA_ANSWER , A.CREATE_DATE , A.STATUS , A.QNACOUNT , A.QNA_STATUS , A.MODIFY_DATE , H.HOTEL_NAME , S.NAME FROM QNA A , HOTEL H , ACCOUNT S WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HOTEL_ID = H.HOTEL_ID AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = S.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.HOTEL_ID = ? AND QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY A.QNA_NO DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT HOTEL_ID , ACCOUNT_ID , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_ADDRESS , HOTEL_PHONE , HOTEL_X , HOTEL_Y , STATUS , BUSINESS_LICENSE , HOTEL_STATUS FROM HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE STATUS = 'N'
SELECT FILE_ID , HOTEL_ID , FILE_NAME , FILE_RENAME , FILE_URL FROM BUSINESS_PHOTO WHERE HOTEL_ID = ?
